import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import AddFavouritesStar from '../components/AddFavouritesStar'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import useFetch from '../useFetch'; const SingleBeerScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [querySingleBeer, setQuerySigleBeer] = useState(id); const { isLoading, data, isError } = useFetch(`/${querySingleBeer}`); useEffect(() => { const dataSingleBeer = data[0]; }, [typeOfSearch]) return ( <> {isLoading &&
LOADING
} {isError &&
ERROR
}

{dataSingleBeer?.name}

{dataSingleBeer?.tagline}

{dataSingleBeer?.description}
ABV: {dataSingleBeer?.abv}%
IBU: {dataSingleBeer?.ibu}
SRM: {dataSingleBeer?.srm}
EBC: {dataSingleBeer?.ebc}
PH: {dataSingleBeer?.ph}

Food pairing

{dataSingleBeer?.food_pairing[0]}
{dataSingleBeer?.food_pairing[1]}
{dataSingleBeer?.food_pairing[2]}
) } export default SingleBeerScreen;
